headline.main: Standing With Brussels Against Terrorism and Fear

snippet: The impulse to rein in civil liberties and freedoms after a barbaric attack only serves the terrorists’ end.
abstract: Editorial acknowledges, in light of Brussels attack, that Europe and the world must prepare for long struggle against terrorism, requiring greater counterterrorism efforts and more cooperation between nations; warns against fearmongering politicians like Donald Trump and of policies that restrict civil liberties and freedoms, noting that best defense against terrorism is promotion of democratic values.
